page.title: 19Buntingford-Luynes Twinning
page.content:
Buntingford is "twinned" with the French town of Luynes. One of the advantages to the people of Buntingford is that thet can stay free of charge at the "Camping" of Luynes!
There have several exchange visits over the years, mostly between children of secondary school age. In the Spring of 1985 a group of teenagers from Ward Freman High School cycled from Buntingford to Luynes, bearing gifts produced locally. These included art work with local subjects, produced at Edwinstree and Ward Freman schools.
Plans are being made for more school exchanges in the years to come.
